sqlMap.select: SELECT t.bank_acct_id AS bankAcctId, t.cur_bal AS curBal FROM dms_tb_bank_account t, dms_tb_account p WHERE t.acc_id = p.acc_id AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND p.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.acc_code = #accCode#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE dms_tb_bank_account t SET t.modify_date = NOW(), t.modify_user = #modifyUser#, t.cur_bal= t.cur_bal + #amount# WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.bank_acct_id = #bankAcctId#
